title: Refrigerator Dispenser Control Module
description: Refrigerator Dispenser Control Module ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 2 Reviews PartSelect Number PS12071009 Manufacturer Part Number 242270106 A dispenser control module is an electronic component that controls the dispensing functions within a refrigerator's door or panel. It releases filtered water, ice, and crushed ice on demand.

installationInstructions.author: Gerald from MERIDIAN, MS
installationInstructions.title: The fridge icemaker would pit out crushed ice. No whole cubes
installationInstructions.content: I had to remove everything  inside including the surrounding box and disconnect  all the wire connector s. The   solenoid that was bad was behind the cover that the auger motor cover. . Job was  easy after  I determined I had to  remove  everything  that was not attached to the  back wall.
